data.title: Certified Ethical Hacker
data.longDesc:
The Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) certification is a professional credential designed for individuals interested in ethical hacking and cybersecurity. Offered by the EC-Council, the CEH certification validates the skills and knowledge needed to identify and address vulnerabilities in computer systems and networks.

Score: 99.2%

data.title: eLearnSecurity Junior Penetration Tester
data.longDesc:
INE Security's eJPT is an entry-level certification for aspiring penetration testers, affirming the candidate's proficiency in fundamental knowledge, skills, and abilities necessary for a role as a junior penetration tester. The practical exam encompasses Assessment Methodologies, Host and Network Auditing, Host and Network Penetration Testing, as well as Web Application Penetration Testing.

Score: 85%

data.title: Organizational Systems Security Analyst
data.longDesc: The Organizational Systems Security Analyst™ (OSSA™) is a globally recognized certification in practical and technical IT security. It has been instrumental in transforming IT professionals into cybersecurity practitioners, providing guidance on effectively securing enterprise applications, systems, and networks at a technical level for diverse organizations.

data.title: Student Volunteer Recognition Programme
data.longDesc: The SVRP seeks to pique students' interest in cybersecurity while also promoting volunteerism among them. It comprises of 3 pillars where students can volunteer: Skills-based, Events-based and Leadership. The award also comes in 3 tiers: Bronze, Silver, Gold. I have been awarded the Bronze tier in 2021, which is attainable through either 30hrs Skills, 60hrs Events, 30 hours Leadership, or half the hours of all 3 pillars combined. I was then awarded the Silver tier in 2022, attainable through the completion of 2 pillars.

data.title: Diploma with Merit
data.longDesc: The Diploma with Merit is given to students who are in the top 10% of the graduating cohort and display good overall conduct.

data.title: Director's Honour Roll
data.longDesc: The Director's Honour Roll award is given to students who are in the top 10% in terms of academic performance, and have exemplary personal record.
